text: Ta de zhu jieshoule ta, bing shi ta jianquan de chengzhang, qie shi zai kai li ya fuyu ta. Zai kai li ya mei ci jin nei dian qu kan ta, dou faxian ta mianqian you jiyang, ta shuo:“Mai er yan a! Ni zenme hui you zhege ne?” Ta shuo:“Zhe shi cong wo de zhu nali jiangxia de.” Zhenzhu biding wu liang di gong gei tasuo yiyu de ren
